title: Highlight Presenting Complaint on Case Cards

requirements.text: On the case card UI, visually emphasize the “Presenting Complaint” field by rendering the presenting complaint text inside a distinct blue bordered/filled box (similar in prominence to the existing emphasized Notes styling), so it stands out more than surrounding fields.

quotes: Put a blue box around presenting complaint to make it stand out more

acceptanceCriteria: In the main case list view, when a case has a non-empty Presenting Complaint, it is displayed inside a visually distinct blue box (border and subtle background fill) on the CaseCard.
The Presenting Complaint emphasis styling works in both light and dark themes and does not reduce readability.
No user-facing text labels are changed; the label remains “Presenting Complaint”.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components are read-only).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Do not change checklist item defaults or checklist semantics (checked items represent tasks still needing to be done and appear under Remaining Tasks).
Do not change backend data models or perform state migrations for this request.
Do not alter existing Notes field emphasis styling except as needed for consistent layout spacing.
